content:
To install TensorFlow and Hugging Face Transformers libraries in WordPress, you need to follow these steps:

1. Access your WordPress server via SSH or FTP.
2. Navigate to your WordPress root directory and locate the wp-config.php file.
3. Open the wp-config.php file and add the following line of code to it:
```sql
define('FS_METHOD', 'direct');
```
This code enables direct file system access for WordPress.

1. Create a new directory in the root directory of your WordPress installation and name it "libraries".
2. Download the TensorFlow and Hugging Face Transformers libraries from their respective websites.
3. Unzip the downloaded files and copy the folders to the "libraries" directory you created in step 4.
4. Update your PHP code to include the TensorFlow and Hugging Face Transformers libraries. To do this, add the following lines of code to your PHP file:
```php
require_once(ABSPATH . 'libraries/tensorflow/autoload.php');
require_once(ABSPATH . 'libraries/transformers/autoload.php');
```
These lines of code load the TensorFlow and Hugging Face Transformers libraries.

1. Save your PHP file and upload it to your WordPress server.
2. You can now use the TensorFlow and Hugging Face Transformers libraries in your WordPress website.
